content.para: Worms are mysterious creatures, they appear to come out of no where. However, this is not true. The worm starts in a cocoon created some time after two adult worms reproduce. Today is your lucky day, you have emerged from the cocoon and are now a hatchling. Begin your worm journey! Please admire the picture of you (a small, hatchling worm). (Earthworm Society of Britain n.d)

image.alt: a cartoon illustration of a worm hatchling

content.para: Phew! That was quick. Life as a worm moves fast. Worms live 8 years at a maximum (much shorter than humans). However, an average suburban garden worm lives 1-2 years. (ABC Education, 2022)

image.alt: a cartoon illustration of a worm hatchling

content.para: Being a worm is one of the most fun things ever.

image.alt: a cartoon illustration of a worm hatchling

content.para: Worms reach adulthood at around 1 year. We have a while to go yet!

image.alt: a cartoon illustration of a worm hatchling

content.para: A worm's burrowing helps to break up soil and spread nutrients and water throughout it.

image.alt: a cartoon illustration of a worm hatchling

content.para: Being a worm is possibly the most fun thing I have ever done.

image.alt: a cartoon illustration of a worm hatchling

content.para: I spent a long time making this game. I hope you like it!

image.alt: a cartoon illustration of a worm hatchling

content.para: Play through the next round to see the worm with a hat on

image.alt: a cartoon illustration of a worm hatchling

content.para: Enjoy. The worm. With a hat (it is still a hatchling actually). It has a hat. Don't you see? A hat. Isn't this the coolest thing you have ever seen? Wow. I was blown away when I made this.

image.alt: a cartoon illustration of a worm hatchling

content.para: Great job making it to day 10!

image.alt: a cartoon illustration of a worm hatchling

content.para: Day 11 is my favourite day.

image.alt: a cartoon illustration of a worm hatchling

content.para: The worm life is rather repeditive. Lucky they don't have very good memory!

image.alt: a cartoon illustration of a worm hatchling

content.para: Hm. Maybe one day I'll be a big worm.

image.alt: a cartoon illustration of a worm hatchling

content.para: Remember this: pizza. It is important in the next day

image.alt: a cartoon illustration of a worm hatchling

content.para: My favourite food is _ _ _ _ _. Guess the word!

image.alt: a cartoon illustration of a worm hatchling

content.para: Hope you enjoyed that little game.

image.alt: a cartoon illustration of a worm hatchling

content.para: The hat fell off sorry.

image.alt: a cartoon illustration of a worm hatchling

content.para: Day 18. Is the day. Today.

image.alt: a cartoon illustration of a worm hatchling

content.para: Do you like worms?

image.alt: a cartoon illustration of a worm hatchling

content.para: Whoever made this game is a genius

image.alt: a cartoon illustration of a worm hatchling
a cartoon illustration of a worm hatchling

content.para: I forgot to put anything in the last day sorry

image.alt: a cartoon illustration of a worm hatchling

content.para: I hope you are enjoying the game!

image.alt: a cartoon illustration of a worm hatchling

image.path: If you made it this far the worms will love you (maybe I haven't verified this claim)
image.alt: a cartoon illustration of a worm hatchling

content.para: I'm glad you are liking this game so much!

image.alt: a cartoon illustration of a worm hatchling

content.para: Well well well. If it isn't Bennison. Playing this stupid game again.

image.alt: a cartoon illustration of a worm hatchling

content.para: Love your work. Huge fan.

image.alt: a cartoon illustration of a worm hatchling

content.para: If your favourite food is pizza please put your hand up

image.alt: a cartoon illustration of a worm hatchling

content.para: Mine is FYI. I think I said that earlier though.

image.alt: a cartoon illustration of a worm hatchling

content.para: Day 30! One month being a worm.

image.alt: a cartoon illustration of a worm hatchling

content.para: Don't you think its time to return to human form now?

image.alt: a cartoon illustration of a worm hatchling

content.para: I am running out of steam for this to be honest.

image.alt: a cartoon illustration of a worm hatchling

content.para: Just imagine this game keeps on going. For 8 years. And at 1 year the worm picture changes to this one. Here fine you graduate. Wow adult worm look at you. Fancy. You can keep playing the game, it will just be stuck on this day.

image.alt: a cartoon illustration of a worm hatchling
